title: How to set up my previous gmail email account
content: I want to re set up my gmail account. I have had my computer reinstalled Windows 10 pro.
creator: ken.harry.074419

title: Passcode
content: I still need help with passcode. I sent a response about my first question passcode. Your webpage is very complicated and I do not understand it. I can't get to the last thing I did very easily. Currently I have remember my device turned on so no passcode is sent when I log on. I don't know how to turn it off. I have been working about a week on this problem. I think one message said you needed to input passcode when you are asked for password. I also do not understand how to change the password when asked for new password. Also, I have not been giving donations to Thunderbird because they only appear to accept credit cards.
creator: jeraldasmith

title: Email Signature Images not displaying
content:
Hi All,

Long time user of TB. Have worked with a number of signatures over the years. I occasionally have the below problem. This time it has become quite frustrating.

I have pictures in my email signature.

I have recently moved folders for all of my data. I get it. I need to update the path information for the HTML (built in MS Word) file. I have done that.

The signature is there... the images are not. The borders around the images are there, the images are not.

I do not know what is blocking the images from coming through.

I have the same issure on another computer that I use. Though I have never been abale to ge the pictures to load on that system. Borders only.

Image below with borders, no images

Any help would be much appreciated.

Thank you

Toll
creator: tolle

title: Sending of Username did not succeed
content:
Dear Sir

I have an issue regarding receive and sending an email from my thunderbird account. So i just take a look for SMTP server port without editing any parameter, after that i try to login the thunderbird account using mail app on my Android. But i cant login on the android then my account on thunderbird PC is error. The error said:

Sending of Username did not succed. Mail server <my mail server> responded: Protocol Error. 14

Because of that error, i cant sending or receiveng email via thunderbird. Can anyone please give your advice to solve my issue?

Thankyou...
creator: rizalamirahdalal

title: Table cells background color/shading not printing
content:
Windows 10, TB 115.9.0(x64)

Colored or shaded table cell backgrounds (<td bgcolor="xxxxxx">) are not printed. [Colored text is printed, inside or outside tables.] Before I file a bug report, can someone confirm? - or tell me what I am doing wrong?

Thanks, John
creator: kaufmann

title: disable or slow down "spring-loaded" folders in mailbox column
content:
Is there a hidden interface flag/control to adjust if (or how quickly) the spring-loaded folders pop open? On the old MacBook Pro my wife uses they spring open immediately, pushing the mailbox she wants to drop the selected messages into up and down out of view and often the messages drop into some random folder and she has to go looking for where they wound up.

Thunderbird 115.5.0 on MacOS 10.12
creator: notarysojac1
